description:
Rito delivers assignments to a sick Yuki who panics with a boy in her room. Frazzled and fumbling, Rito accidentally touches her breasts. Rito wears Lala’s glasses, which enable the wearer to see through people’s clothing. Saruyama falls in love with Rito, and Lala sets up a date for them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Special Love Potion / Looking at You Through the Lens... / The Lovely You Is Cinderella
Tokkou Yaku / Lens Goshi ni Miru Kimi wa... / Itoshi no Kimi wa Cinderella
Un remède miracle / À travers mes lunettes / Ma chère Cendrillon
特恋薬(とっこーやく)♡ / レンズ越しに見る君は... / 愛しの君はシンデレラ♡
